tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Kalpana with my friend who got chicken pox. Dr. Kalpana was extremely friendly and she checked my friend very carefully. The medicines which she prescribed helped my friend to recover very quickly without suffering much from high fiver or headache or lose of appetite. I highly recommend her to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: In the critical situation where the fever was beyond control 102-103.2F , Dr Kalpana’s medications and consultation were a saviour. In no time, the medicines did wonders and I was recovering from Fever and Omicron as well. Proper follow ups and constant guidance made her a real Hero. Our whole family would be obliged to her .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very empathetic doctor.    Very effective diagnosis and treatment.   Felt a significant improvement from the very first day and within a few days my sugars came down, my infection disappeared and started to feel wonderful.    

Highly recommended to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
It’s regarding my mother’s treatment. She is senior citizen. Dr Kalpana treating her with human touch. Explaining everything during the treatment. My mother just said that Dr has become our family member now….sharing birthday cakes and love
Really appreciates the efforts by Dr

Doctor Kalpana is very friendly and caring. I met her at her residence for some urgent injections that I needed for my condition. even at odd hours, she smilingly addressed my requirements. through her stories of her personal experiences she makes a tough condition also seem easy. i would recommend this caring doctor
Doctor asks to get admitted at first meeting itself just to diagnose what is the cause of the issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very approachable doctor. 
She gives good advice and is very professional and punctual. I have been seeing the doctor for my whole family
I visited her for body cramps and numbness. She was patient enough to hear out my concern and give a proper suggestion and medications. Found her to be very friendly and attentive.

*** ******* ** ** ********* ******* She gives proper time and attention to their patients. Her treatment is very effective as well.

I definitely recommend her.

she is very caring doctor....she knows how to handle the situation very welll..doctor is very sincere nd kind

**** **** ****** **** ** ***** ********* provided 10/10 
Doctor took the treatment with patience and accuracy.
 Very happy to have chosen Dr Kalpana as my doctor.

*** ******* ** **** ************* *** *** *** **** ********** She made sure that she captured the history perfectly and then had prescribed the ******* medicines which worked. 

She is also very polite and listens to your problems with patience.

I was having trouble with my blood sugar. When I consulted Dr Kalpana explain me very nicely the entire process of controlling diabetes. After starting the medication for four weeks I was able to control my blood sugar levels. Highly recommend Dr Kalpana.

The doctor is very nice. She pays complete attention and explains the problems in a lucid way. The best part was, she didn't recommend 'a lot of pills' which I personally don't like to consume. Thanks Doctor. God bless.
**** ****** ** ****** I was relieved more than 90% just by consultation and care shown. Recommended!
Very nice and  superb doctor…. Great explanation ..over all good experience . Checked our bp n weight .
